subject: Charge of interst at SBI PLR plus 2% for grant of additional advance or for deferment of recovery of advances
text: 9ri4 r714 RTTTAT Mffera5rut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (T36 4R4gT 4r 7f raaa) Extn . 2223/2318/2468/2553 0anr National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110045 No. 11041/21/2002/Admn-III February 25, 2004 POLICY MATTERS-ADMINISTRATIONFINANCE (72/2004) (Decision taken on Finance Division file No NHAIF& A/Policy Matters/2003/210) It has been decided to charge interest at SBI PLR plus 2% in respect of all the decisions taken on Or after March 1_ 2004 for grant of additional advance or for deferment of recovery of advances. The interest (SBI PLR) would continue to be charged prevailing o the date of release without any provision for interest reset, 2 This issues with the approval of Chairan; [V.K Sharma] General Manager (Admn ) All Members AII CGMs/CVO/CPDIGMs AlI DGMs/Managers AlL PIUs/CMUsISPVs for information to: PS to Chairman Librarian/Hindi Officer Director (Audit), RAP, NHAI NHAI Copy
